query:
ALTER TABLE subscriptions
  CHANGE COLUMN `website_id` `websiteId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN `user_id` `userId` int(11) NOT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN `stripe_customer_id` `stripeCustomerId` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN `stripe_subscription_id` `stripeSubscriptionId` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN `add_ons` `addOns` json DEFAULT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN `current_period_end` `currentPeriodEnd` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN `created_at` `createdAt` bigint(20) NOT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN `updated_at` `updatedAt` bigint(20) NOT NULL;

  CHANGE COLUMN `stripe_customer_id` `stripeCustomerId` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
  CHANGE COLUMN `stripe_subscription_id` `stripeSubscriptionId` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
